summary: Adds armor variety to Stormcloak Forces.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured.png[/img][/url][/center]



Stormcloak Armor Variety
--------------------------------------------
By Person Numbered 275



Regarding compatibility: It has been noted that compatibility issues that arise may be solved by placing this mod nearer to the bottom of the load order.


Also see Imperial Legion Armor Variety Here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9222


Description
-------------
This mod adds a chance for most standard Stormcloaks to spawn with different armor other than Stormcloak gear:
Details:

Normal
-------------------
30% chance of normal armor
15% chance of spawning without a helmet
A chance of spawning with other rebel hold Guard Cuirass
-5% chance for Winterhold Guard Cuirass
-10% chance for Pale (Dawnstar) Guard Cuirass
-20% chance for Rift (Riften) Guard Cuirass
20% chance for spawning with Normal and Banded Iron Armor

Option 1
------------
30% chance to spawn with normal armor
5% chance to spawn with Stormcloak Officer/Bear armor
10% chance of spawning without a helmet
A chance of spawning with other rebel hold Guard Cuirass
-5% chance for Winterhold Guard Cuirass
-10% chance for Pale (Dawnstar) Guard Cuirass
-20% chance for Rift (Riften) Guard Cuirass
20% chance for spawning with Normal and Banded Iron Armor

Option 2
-------------------
30% chance to spawn with normal armor
5% chance to spawn with Stormcloak Officer/Bear armor
A chance of spawning with other rebel hold Guard Cuirass
-5% chance for Winterhold Guard Cuirass
-10% chance for Pale (Dawnstar) Guard Cuirass
-20% chance for Rift (Riften) Guard Cuirass
15% chance for spawning with Normal and Banded Iron Armor
10% chance of spawning with Leather Armor
5% chance of spawning in Steel Armor

Option 3
-------------------
40% chance to spawn with normal armor
5% chance to spawn with Stormcloak Officer/Bear armor
20% chance for spawning with Normal and Banded Iron Armor
20% chance of spawning with Leather Armor
10% chance of spawning in Steel Armor





I can add optional esps with different chances if requested.

NOTE: you will have to wait for cells to respawn for these changes to take effect.




Bugs
--------
None known at the moment.
author: Person Numbered 275
